triples.name: Bayesian network
triples.relevance: The paper is a comprehensive survey of algorithms for learning Bayesian Network structure from data.

triples.name: Graphical model
triples.relevance: Bayesian networks are a type of probabilistic graphical model used throughout the surveyed algorithms.

triples.name: Causal inference
triples.relevance: The paper addresses structure learning under causal assumptions, a key aspect of causal inference.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Bayesian network structure learning is a fundamental machine learning task for discovering structure from data.

triples.name: Uncertainty quantification
triples.relevance: Bayesian networks are used for reasoning under uncertainty, a core aspect of uncertainty quantification.

triples.name: Knowledge engineering
triples.relevance: The paper discusses incorporating expert knowledge into the learning process, a key knowledge engineering task.
